articles.title: Mcap of five of top-10 most valued firms erode by ₹1.67 lakh crore; HDFC Bank biggest laggard - CNBCTV18
articles.description: Shares of HDFC Bank fell for the third day in a row on Friday, tumbling over 12%, as investors deserted the counter after the company's December quarter earnings failed to impress the market. HDFC Bank shares bounced back on Saturday, climbing 0.54%.
